titleStmt.title: Ens fictum Shakerlæi or the annihilation of Mr. Jeremie Shakerley, his in-artificiall anatomy of Urania practica. Wherein his falacies or ignorance, are demonstratively detected his malice in its groundlesse colours display'd, and the authors of the said Urania practica justly vindicated from his unjust aspersions. By Vin. Wing, and Will. Leybourn, philomathematicis.
titleStmt.author: Wing, Vincent, 1619-1668.

titleStmt.title: Ens fictum Shakerlæi or the annihilation of Mr. Jeremie Shakerley, his in-artificiall anatomy of Urania practica. Wherein his falacies or ignorance, are demonstratively detected his malice in its groundlesse colours display'd, and the authors of the said Urania practica justly vindicated from his unjust aspersions. By Vin. Wing, and Will. Leybourn, philomathematicis.
titleStmt.author: Wing, Vincent, 1619-1668.
Leybourn, William, 1626-1716.

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Shakerley, Jeremy. The anatomy of Urania practica.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
